page.title: 10Cattistock's Health Services
page.content: The doctor's surgery is in another village about a mile and a quarter distant and is staffed by three practitioners who are on duty alternately. For those who cannot attend the surgery by appointment one or other of the doctors does a visiting round. Prescriptions are dispensed from the doctor's surgery and a chiropodist attends at the surgery weekly. A District Nurse lives in Cattistock in a house provided by the Health Authority for such a nurse. The nearest hospital is about nine miles away in Dorchester and has a Maternity Unit but no Casualty Department. The nearest Casualty Department is about 12 miles away at Yeovil. A Home Help Service and Meals on Wheels are also available.
